title: And this is the problem with Riot.
body:
25 Game chat restriction. For having an inting player on my team and an afk before the minion waves hit mid field. And this is the only game they list. I do overreact sometimes, but seriously Riot. Learn that trolls and people intentionally ruining games are way more toxic than someone that talks to fucking much. Good game, bad responses. 
Game 1
In-Game
Jedifarmer: Ill take it, to bad cho was there
Jedifarmer: but should get you a good lead jinx
Jedifarmer: ok well youre not good enough to handle a lead so, it is what it is :)
Jedifarmer: not my fault your sub par jinxipoo
Jedifarmer: yeah afk and int
Jedifarmer: yas and jinx
Jedifarmer: wow amumu youre a piece of useless shit too
Jedifarmer: report amumu as well
Jedifarmer: walked around the corner and waited for you to kill me
Jedifarmer: then jumped back in
Jedifarmer: he was right around the corner the whole time while we were fighting
Jedifarmer: lol i think its you feeding trolls that need to not play ranked
Jedifarmer: good job by the way naut
Jedifarmer: he quit before the game started
Jedifarmer: yes ammu i know youre bad keep talking
Jedifarmer: good ult raka
Jedifarmer: not even slightly but they dont deserve to leave early they deserve to sit here and int so i can report them
Jedifarmer: you can if you want, but at least im playing the game
Jedifarmer: lol youre so funny
Jedifarmer: yall are the reason this game is so toxic
Jedifarmer: you mean the team maliciously inting and afking
Jedifarmer: i think you dont understand what is toxic and what isnt
Jedifarmer: i hope you do naut
Jedifarmer: youre a shining beacon of sportsmanship
Post-Game
Jedifarmer: gj naut
Jedifarmer: you did great naut honored you
Jedifarmer: Not playing with anyone amumu you and jinx are the worst kind of blight on this game atm
Jedifarmer: at least yas was just an afking troll
